    (package private) void
    encode​(OutputStream os)
    Size of palette written is the smallest power of 2 that can accomdate he number of RGB colors detected (or largest color index, in case of index pixels).
    private void
    filterPixels​(DrawingPanel.DirectGif89Frame dgf)
    This method accomplishes three things: (1) converts the passed rgb pixels to indexes into our rgb lookup table (2) fills the rgb table as new colors are encountered (3) looks for transparent pixels so as to set the transparent index The information is cumulative across multiple calls.

    • encode

      void encode​(OutputStream os) throws IOException
      Size of palette written is the smallest power of 2 that can accomdate he number of RGB colors detected (or largest color index, in case of index pixels).
      Parameters:
      os - outputstream to be encoded.
      Throws:
      IOException - possible throw

    • filterPixels

      private void filterPixels​(DrawingPanel.DirectGif89Frame dgf) throws IOException
      This method accomplishes three things: (1) converts the passed rgb pixels to indexes into our rgb lookup table (2) fills the rgb table as new colors are encountered (3) looks for transparent pixels so as to set the transparent index The information is cumulative across multiple calls.
      Parameters:
      dgf - pizels to be filtered.
      Throws:
      IOException - possible throw
